class: title-slide, center, middle, inverse

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.height=4, fig.width=6}
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)

mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = mpg, y = hp, color = as.factor(cyl))) + 
  geom_point() +
  theme_half_open() +
  labs(
    x = 'Fuel economy (mpg)', 
    y = 'Power (hp)',
    color = '# Cylinders')
```
